name: io.github.ryanmat/logicmonitor
description: LogicMonitor API integration with 167 tools for alerts, devices, dashboards, and more.

environmentVariables.name: LM_ACCESS_ID
environmentVariables.description: LMv1 API access ID (required for log/metric ingestion)

environmentVariables.name: LM_ACCESS_KEY
environmentVariables.description: LMv1 API access key (required for log/metric ingestion)

environmentVariables.name: LM_ENABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated tool names or glob patterns to enable (e.g., get_*,create_device)

environmentVariables.name: LM_DISABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated tool names or glob patterns to disable (e.g., delete_*)

environmentVariables.name: LM_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging level for API request debugging (debug, info, warning, error)
